typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		InstallationYear as string,
		EnvironmentAgingRate as string,
		Quantity as string,
		HealthScore as string,
		FinancialConsequencesFactor as string,
		EnvironmentalConsequencesFactor as string,
		NetworkConsequencesFactor as string,
		ExtraArea as string,
		DateOfLastSpecificAction as string,
		DateOfLastStateRecording as string,
		KnownApparentAge as string,
		CriticalityLevelFailure as string,
		CriticalityLevelNetworkConstraint as string,
		ExtraAreaLevel2 as string,
		SAIDI15min as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadUpdateEquipmentComponents
ReadUpdateEquipmentComponents select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name,
		InstallationYear,
		EnvironmentAgingRate,
		Quantity,
		HealthScore,
		FinancialConsequencesFactor,
		EnvironmentalConsequencesFactor,
		NetworkConsequencesFactor,
		ExtraArea,
		DateOfLastSpecificAction,
		DateOfLastStateRecording,
		KnownApparentAge,
		CriticalityLevelFailure,
		CriticalityLevelNetworkConstraint,
		ExtraAreaLevel2,
		SAIDI15min),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:EquipmentComponent;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'false') ~> ModelDefinition
source(output(
		EquipmentComponent as string,
		CustomData as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapCustomDataString
ReadMapCustomDataString aggregate(groupBy(EquipmentComponent),
	CustomDataString = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(CustomData)), collect(toString(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapCustomDataStringKeyCustomData
AggregateMapCustomDataStringKeyCustomData derive(CustomDataString = replace(replace(replace(CustomDataString, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> CustomDataStringCleaning
ModelDefinition, CustomDataStringCleaning join({$id} == EquipmentComponent,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> CustomDataStringUnion
CustomDataStringUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{InstallationYear},
		{EnvironmentAgingRate},
		{Quantity},
		{HealthScore},
		{FinancialConsequencesFactor},
		{EnvironmentalConsequencesFactor},
		{NetworkConsequencesFactor},
		{ExtraArea},
		{DateOfLastSpecificAction},
		{DateOfLastStateRecording},
		{KnownApparentAge},
		{CriticalityLevelFailure},
		{CriticalityLevelNetworkConstraint},
		{ExtraAreaLevel2},
		{SAIDI15min},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		{CustomData_String} = CustomDataString),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomDataStringSelect
source(output(
		EquipmentComponent as string,
		CustomData as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapCustomDataNumber
ReadMapCustomDataNumber aggregate(groupBy(EquipmentComponent),
	CustomDataNumber = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(CustomData)), collect(toFloat(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapCustomDataNumberKeyCustomData
AggregateMapCustomDataNumberKeyCustomData derive(CustomDataNumber = replace(replace(replace(CustomDataNumber, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> CustomDataNumberCleaning
CustomDataStringSelect, CustomDataNumberCleaning join({$id} == EquipmentComponent,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> CustomDataNumberUnion
CustomDataNumberUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{InstallationYear},
		{EnvironmentAgingRate},
		{Quantity},
		{HealthScore},
		{FinancialConsequencesFactor},
		{EnvironmentalConsequencesFactor},
		{NetworkConsequencesFactor},
		{ExtraArea},
		{DateOfLastSpecificAction},
		{DateOfLastStateRecording},
		{KnownApparentAge},
		{CriticalityLevelFailure},
		{CriticalityLevelNetworkConstraint},
		{ExtraAreaLevel2},
		{SAIDI15min},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		{CustomData_String},
		{CustomData_Number} = CustomDataNumber),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomDataNumberSelect
CustomDataNumberSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_EquipmentComponents.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
